I will not suggest you buy a Surface.
I got a surface pro 4 around 2016-2017, and each year will have one problem:
Monitor connection(those pixels near the bottom will becomes black)
Swollen Battery(the monitor is , I still keep the photos, if you want to see, just reply me)
Fan noise(very strange, suddenly hear "GIGIGI" and louder than other surface pro 4 I used before)
I am still using it, but I will never recommend the others use it.
At least give me a thunderbolt 3 port la, so I can try to use external GPU to improve performance. I suggest you buy another machine with thunderbolt 3. Dell and HP both have one. Please notice that Dell and HP both may have some battery problem, their battery is shit as Surface, but not swollen easily. If you buy from those brand, I suggest you make sure that warranty is apply to the battery.(Dell does not, and Dell's premium support is nothing but tell you how to install software, extra RAM, it is not warranty, just a shit)

P.S. Since every year have one problem need to fix, the warranty never expire.Notice that the machine will go back to mainland China to fix, and they will not give back the original machine, and you have to wait about a week until new machine arrive to your hand, and install everything back may cost you another week. I already suffer at least 3 times la.

This only my opinion, wish can help you la.
